# Installation
> `npm install --save @types/ncp`

# Summary
This package contains type definitions for ncp (https://github.com/AvianFlu/ncp).

# Details
Files were exported from https://github.com/DefinitelyTyped/DefinitelyTyped/tree/master/types/ncp.
